vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for vehicle or engine repair or maintenance use on property zoned Planned Development District No. 534, the C.F. Hawn Special Purpose District No. 2, Subdistrict 1 with D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, at the northeast corner of San Marino Avenue and Turin Avenue
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z201-244(LG)
